title: 10MIN full body hourglass pilates workout // no equipment & beginner friendly | LIDIAVMERA
description:
perfect for those mornings you don't have much time but still want to get some movement in or for a little night-time pilates session! 

Hope you have fun doing this workout! 
Love you all, Lidi x

next workout video: Sunday 4th August, 5pm UK time ♡

♡ MORE OF ME ♡
TikTok | http://bit.ly/3jKm4Bo
Instagram | http://bit.ly/3jLe4A4

disclaimer: 
I am sharing my personal workouts. If you experience any type of pain or discomfort during this workout, stop immediately, modify as necessary and/or rejoin me on another video. By implementing this workout in your routine, you agree and understand Lidiavmera limited will not be held responsible or liable for any injury that may occur as a result of this workout video.
channelDescription:
what a journey it is to understanding how to feel our best, so hey, lets do it together ♡ sharing my life as a 23 year-old living in London & my at-home workouts with you as a certified Pilates instructor (L3 pilates mat instructor) 
hope you stick around 🤍
ly all millions
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/FuTiqNBj_vc" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: Hi Lidia! I discovered your channel about a month ago and I have been doing pilates with you (watching your videos alongside😄) almost every day! You inspire me to stay fit and workout, and you're very beautiful💕 sending much loves, and I wish everyone a great weekend🫶
I’ve been doing your workouts for 9 days straight and I see such a great difference. Finally my stomach is flatter, I’m loosing weight and my thigh fat has gone down by a lot 🙈
I needed a 10-minute training for my mornings and I just entered your channel and I was surprised to see that you posted a new video, thank you!
I now workout consistently because of you I really love your videos ❤️
I absolutely LOVE this class. Haven't have fun like this working out in a while!! Thank you so much Lidia <3
